title: Harlequin
brief_description: A series of animated stories by various students at the Newton Creative Arts Center. Called the Yellow Ball Workshop and instructed by Yvonne Anderson some of the shorts are: Red Cat by Daniel Sterne; Fountain Fantasie by Tamara Hurwitz; Evolution Now by Fred Allen; A Joy Ride by Pamela Gilfillan and Rock of Ages by Stephen Wren.
